prs.title: Set timeout for golangci-lint in CI
prs.truncated_body:
Context: https://github.com/smartcontractkit/chainlink/pull/17960#discussion_r2116287284

golangci-lint removed the run timeout in their v2 config so we'll add it via GHA for this step to cap the execution run time.

commits.message: Set timeout for golangci-lint in CI

prs.title: Start porting docs content
prs.truncated_body:
## Summary

Port across the price feed MDX files and display components

## Rationale

There's still more content to be added, but this PR should also fix the Eslint errors that are currently being triggered on main.

commits.message:
chore (wip): copy price feeds content from documentation site 'as-is'

The current documentation does not have the required frontmatter and it
uses components which need to be refactored or ported across as well.

Because of this rendering will be totally broken while we work on adding
the missing metadata and components.
chore: update front matter to match new schema
feat: update front matter for all Pyth Core docs
fix: use a more developer friendly voice for descriptions and tone down marketing speak
feat: add component to display strings truncated in the middle
feat: add callout component with variant support
chore: automatically make content components available in MDX pages
chore: update eslint and turbo configs
fix: port across content and fix minor issues
feat: add content to sidebar navigation
chore (wip): temporarily remove api-reference pages so other content can build

fix (prettier): add ignore tags to prevent prettier from breaking fenced code block

Known issue in current version of Prettier.
See: https://github.com/prettier/prettier/issues/15740

fix: make accessibility and configuration improvements to TruncateToMiddle

- Outputs whole string in a second hidden span to play nicer with assistive
technologies.
- Accepts optional minCharsStart and minCharsEnd values to set the minimum
number of characters to display. This is an approximation based on the width
of the 0 (zero) character
fix: make Callout a thin wrapper around InfoBox to set suitable defaults
feat: add text case converter component
fix: update CopyAddress to use existing CopyButton component
feat: seperate the navigation and copy actions in CopyAddress
feat: remove Callout component and replace with InfoBox

prs.truncated_body:
## Description

Breakout from the larger PR #1673

## Changes

**Note:** This PR _only_ affects test-related code. The new transactions are _not used_ in any actual tests here (see the other PR for that), with the exception of the handful of new tests explicitly testing the transactional functionality for the in-mem store.

- `SharedStore` now implements `Transactable` which l

prs.title: fix: use single utxo selection for deposit action and token deposit fee
prs.truncated_body:
### Motivation

There were two bugs:

(i) the utxo selection for deposit action and token creation deposit fee happens in different phases, so we must mark the utxos as selected after the first phase, so we don't select the same one in the second phase.
(ii) we were selecting two different utxos when we could have only one for an HTR deposit action and token creation deposit fee.

### Accep

commits.message: fix: use single utxo selection for deposit action and token deposit fee
tests: add test with multiple utxos selected
use full method to get tx HTR deposit
refactor: use data?.length to reduce code
